title: Publish Indicator
subtitle: Share your indicator with the community

codeView.label: Allow code viewing
codeView.desc: Users can view the source code of your indicator

chartView.label: Allow chart viewing
chartView.desc: Visual analysis can be performed on asset charts

placeholders.description: What does this indicator do, what was it built for, under which market conditions does it perform best...

info.p1: From this panel, you can define which features of your indicator will be accessible by users.
info.p2: Each permission affects how your indicator is displayed and what actions users can take.
info.tipText: Allowing more permissions can help your indicator reach a wider audience.
